snippet: If the government chooses to take a closer look at the Facebook-Instagram merger, it could be based on a theory that Facebook bought Instagram to cut off potential competition somewhere down the line.
abstract: If the government chooses to take a closer look at the Facebook-Instagram merger, it could be based on a theory that Facebook bought Instagram to cut off potential competition somewhere down the line.

headline.main: Why Would the Feds Investigate the Facebook-Instagram Deal?
